quotes.quote: It\’s not a bug. It\’s an undocumented feature!

quotes.quote: Software Developer” – An organism that turns caffeine into software

quotes.quote: If debugging is the process of removing software bugs, then programming must be the process of putting them in
quotes.author: Edsger Dijkstra

quotes.quote: A user interface is like a joke. If you have to explain it, it’s not that good.

quotes.quote: I don’t care if it works on your machine! We are not shipping your machine!

quotes.quote: Measuring programming progress by lines of code is like measuring aircraft building progress by weight.
quotes.author: Bill Gates

quotes.quote: My code DOESN’T work, I have no idea why. My code WORKS, I have no idea why.

quotes.quote: Talk is cheap. Show me the code.

quotes.quote: Software and cathedrals are much the same — first we build them, then we pray.
